PhotographyPage.profileBio: Photography has been part of my life for over a decade — a way to explore how light, shadow, and emotion come together to tell a story. Over the years, I’ve captured everything from the pulse of live events and the quiet moments of weddings to expressive portraits, elegant cars, peaceful landscapes, and authentic images that help brands connect with people.

ApprovalPage.greeting: Hi {clientName}, please select the images you approve for publication in my portfolio.

imageCard.commentDescription: Leave any notes or requests for this image.

terms.title: Publication Agreement
terms.content: By submitting your approval, you grant permission for the selected images to be used in my public portfolio, on social media, and for other promotional purposes. Images that are not selected will remain private and will not be shared publicly.
terms.consentLabel: I agree to the publication terms.
terms.consentDescription: I confirm my selections and grant permission for the approved images to be published.

submitButton.noApprovalAndReview: Submit Without Approvals & Continue to Review

validation.min: You must select at least {count} images.
validation.max: You cannot select more than {count} images.

success.title: Thank You!
